about.paragraph1: Musician and nerd all my life — and now a Full-Stack Web Developer.
about.paragraph2: I started in Sound Engineering, trying to understand why things sound good or bad.
about.paragraph3: That same curiosity to understand how things work led me to code — where logic meets creativity, and every challenge becomes a chance to build something new.
about.subtitle: What I offer

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.text: A responsive e-commerce site built with React, featuring a product catalog, shopping cart, and user authentication. It integrates with a third-party API to fetch product data dynamically.

colorGenerator.title: Color Generator
colorGenerator.text: A color generator app built with React, allowing users to create and save color palettes. It features a user-friendly interface and integrates with a third-party API.

moreProjects.title: More Projects
moreProjects.text: A collection of various projects built with React, showcasing different features and functionalities.

contact.title: Let’s work together
contact.text: Whether you have a project in mind or just want to connect, I’d love to hear from you.
